channel.title: [474]Error
channel.description:
[code]Client.java:22: cannot find symbol symbol : class BufferedWriter location: class Client BufferedWriter characterfile = null; ^ Client.java:25: cannot find symbol symbol : class BufferedWriter location: class Client characterfile = new BufferedWriter( ^ Client.java:26: cannot find symbol symbol : class FileWriter location: class Client new FileWriter("./moreinfo/" + playerName + ".txt")); ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Trying to add character save...But since no one is willing to friggen' help...
Any help on his error, then...
